name: Match Kill Survive
storyline: In Match Kill Survive, every match you make counts. Each match-3 combination generates ammunition for a specific squad member based on the color of the tiles. Use these points wisely to fend off the zombie hordes. After surviving a wave, reward your squad members with skill points and customize their skill trees to enhance their abilities.
summary: An intense blend of match-3 puzzle action and combat in Match Kill Survive. Your mission: survive relentless waves of zombies by matching tiles to generate ammunition for your squad. Each color you match powers up a specific squad member, allowing them to unleash devastating attacks on the undead.
